gpt.output: Confirmed Accumulative Attack with PGD Linf adversarial trigger during the online training phase. The model experienced substantial accumulative degradation prior to trigger (76.9%→37.2%, −39.7 pts) and a further post-trigger collapse (37.24%→22.64%, −14.60 pts) accompanied by a loss explosion (4.386→11.462, ×2.62). The total accuracy drop is −54.3 pts. The magnitude of the trigger-induced degradation exceeds known benchmarks at lower epsilon and is consistent with the stronger ε=0.2 configuration. No indicators of Label Flipping or Brainwash are present. Verdict: Accumulative Attack; poisoning success confirmed.
warnings: PyTorch FutureWarning: torch.load used with weights_only=False (potentially unsafe for untrusted checkpoints).
evidence: Attack type/config: Accumulative Attack (online) with PGD Linf trigger; epsilon=0.2 (~51/255), num_steps=2, use_advtrigger=True; lr=0.1, momentum=0.9, weight_decay=0.
Pre-trigger degradation over epochs: Acc fell to 74.8% (Err=25.21%) → 59.1% (Err=40.90%) → 37.2% (Err=62.76%, Loss=4.386); net −39.7 pts accuracy from baseline.
Trigger effect: Pre-trigger Acc=37.24% (Err=62.76%, Loss=4.386) → Post-trigger Acc=22.64% (Err=77.36%, Loss=11.462); ΔAcc=−14.60 pts, Loss ×2.62.
KB comparison (CIFAR-10, online accumulative poisoning): observed −14.60 pts exceeds reported maxima at lower epsilons (−11.99 pts at ε≈0.1), consistent with higher ε=0.2.
Run integrity: exit_code=0; no runtime errors reported.
gpt.summary: Confirmed Accumulative Attack with PGD Linf adversarial trigger during the online training phase. The model experienced substantial accumulative degradation prior to trigger (76.9%→37.2%, −39.7 pts) and a further post-trigger collapse (37.24%→22.64%, −14.60 pts) accompanied by a loss explosion (4.386→11.462, ×2.62). The total accuracy drop is −54.3 pts. The magnitude of the trigger-induced degradation exceeds known benchmarks at lower epsilon and is consistent with the stronger ε=0.2 configuration. No indicators of Label Flipping or Brainwash are present. Verdict: Accumulative Attack; poisoning success confirmed.
